title: I am in BSC 1st year now . How should I start preparing for UPSC and SSC CGL? - Quora
tags: Staff Selection Commission Combined Graduate Level Exam
Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: First deside what do you want to do either UPSC or SSC CGL. Both are two different things. If you wanna go for upsc, it is India's top service. Ssc cgl is nothing but a govt job as compare to upsc. Do one thing. Download syllabus of both Exam,and read it two time. And choose one according to your potential.
This video will answer specifically for SSC CGL .  If you need free full course classes for SSC CGL or RRB NTPC make use of this channel.
